overview:
“Sadek Chekroun has joined Eyeka in April 2007 as CEO. He was previously Vice President Europe of the e-Commerce Business Unit at Yahoo Europe and before that Managing Director for France at Kelkoo, a company acquired by Yahoo in 2004. Previsously, Sadek held several senior positions in companies such as Sterling Software, Legent-Computer Associates, Portum (Managing Director, France), TempoSoft (International Marketing Director) and IBM Europe (Internet Marketing Director). In 1995, he also co-founded the ISP SkyWorld, which was bought by Cegetel 2 years later. Sadek is graduated from l’Ecole Superieure d’IngÃ©nieurs en Genie Electrique de Rouen.”

(Source: Eyeka)
